item.title: 9/24: CBS Morning News
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel returns to air after suspension; CBS News speaks with leading researcher about White House autism claims.

item.title: What not to do when paying off debt
item.description: If you're trying to pay off debt, make sure to avoid the mistakes that can throw a wrench in your progress.

item.title: RadioShack buyers ran a Ponzi scheme, SEC alleges
item.description: The buyers of distressed brick-and-mortar companies like RadioShack and Modell's Sporting Goods, are accused of running a Ponzi scheme.
